subSubSection.paragraph:
Saldula ( Macrosaldula ) Southwood & Leston, 1959: 324
. Upgraded to generic status by Leston & Southwood, 1964: 80.

bibRefCitation.author: Luo, Z. & Vinokurov, N. N.
bibRefCitation.refString: Luo, Z. & Vinokurov, N. N. (2011) A new species of the genus Macrosaldula Leston et Southwood, 1964 (Hemiptera: Heteroptera: Saldidae) from Northwestern China. Zootaxa, 2909 (1), 57 - 63. https: // doi. org / 10.11646 / zootaxa. 2909.1.6

bibRefCitation.author: Vinokurov, N. N.
bibRefCitation.refString: Vinokurov, N. N. (2013) Validation of Macrosaldula indica Vinokurov (Hemiptera: Heteroptera: Saldidae). Acta Entomologica Musei Nationalis Pragae, 53 (1), 58.

paragraph.treatmentCitationGroup:
Macrosaldula indica
Vinokurov, 2013 : 58
. Valid name. Holotype male ( Národní Museum in Prague, Czech Republic ); India , Himachal Pradesh State , Tandi Vill.,
5 km S of Keylong.

subSubSection.paragraph:
Remarks: Vinokurov (2012: 303) described
M. indica
without fixing a type series. This made the name unavailable under Article 16.4 of the International Code of Zoological Nomenclature. Vinokurov (2013) published an abbreviated description of this species, accompanied by an explicit fixation of the type series to validate its name.

Macrosaldula oblonga acetabularis Cobben, 1985
[p. 306, under
M. oblonga
]

Macrosaldula oblonga oblonga (Stål, 1858)
[p. 306, as
M. oblonga
]
